titleInfo.title: On the levee or Harding field

name.namePart: Printed in New York City by George Miller.

originInfo.edition: Printer's proof, kept by the painter. A numbered edition of ten was printed.

mods.abstract: A handsome, idealized black woman with her face and body turned to the right of the picture plane three-quarters. She appears in the foreground, standing on the levee. It is a shoulder length study of a youngish woman looking imploringly towards the heavens.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art

titleInfo.title: Caroline Wogan Durieux Works of Art

location.physicalLocation: LSU Museum of Art, Shaw Center for the Arts, Baton Rouge, LA

mods.accessCondition: E-mail artmuseum@lsu.edu with questions or comments
